en: You don't have enough coins! You can earn 25 coins by watching a video ad.
tr: Yeterince coin yok! Reklam izleyerek 25 coin kazanabilirsiniz.

en: You failed! What do you want to do?
Whatch video ads and get coins.
tr: Video reklam izleyin ve coin kazanın.

en: Congratulations! You have completed the level!
Would you like to buy it with COIN %d ?
tr: %d coin karşılığı satın almak ister misiniz?
